oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Piet Lynx gives words in his language to Lucy Lloyd. The words cover topography, animals, people, kinds of lizards and more. 1) p.30 opp: 16 October 1879 a list of more Koranna divisions, 2) p.35: date near bottom of page is Nov. 5, 3) this story is found in Kora Book I-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd Kora notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: given by Piet Lynx
